meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #775.

td.p: Bruce Wolfe, a software engineer from San Francisco, California
Sarah Workman, a history teacher from Pomona, California
Janet Holzer, a foreign language teacher from Indianapolis, Indiana (whose 2-day cash winnings total $19,601)

tr.td: WYOMING
FOOD
#1 HITS
MUSEUMS
INTERNATIONAL ACTRESSES
WHAT'S "NEW"?
